Body:
"""Check that we do not allow constraints on the objective metric."""
ax_client = AxClient(GenerationStrategy(steps=[GenerationStep(model=Models.
    SOBOL, num_trials=30)]))
with self.assertRaises(ValueError):
    ax_client.create_experiment(name='test_experiment', parameters=[{'name':
        'x3', 'type': 'fixed', 'value': 2, 'value_type': 'int'}],
        objective_name='test_objective', outcome_constraints=[
        'test_objective >= 3'])
